entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
